entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Surface the `_tabString` Field in `IndentedTextWriter` #68726
  • CI Failure: System.Memory tests failing with seg fault #68722
  • Could not load file or assembly 'NLog.Web.AspNetCore, Version=4.0.0.0' #68720
  • CI Failure: Build Browser wasm Linux Release LibraryTests #68718
  • Build of libraries fails in VS #68716
  • Helix tests failing during reporting with Permission Denied on run.py.log #68715
  • NativeAOT: exception.StackTrace() does not show line numbers #68714
  • Consider adding more tests for the Equals instance method for the various vector types #68710
  • Unsafe.AsRef cannot be used with ref structs #68709
  • Blazor Publish Emscripten Deadlocked #68708
    7.0.0
  • Support running the libraries tests with `UseSystemResourceKeys=true` #68707
  • [API Proposal]: (Re)introduce WeakAttribute that makes a field behave as if it were a WeakReference. #68702
  • ApiCompat errors when building System.Runtime inside Visual Studio #68699
    7.0.0
  • System.Private.CoreLib's fast up-to-date check is broken #68698
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.Public_Interop_ExactVersion_Success(uri: \"https://www.litespeedtech.com/\") #68692
  • Test failure tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh #68690
  • NativeAOT doesnt produce Requires warnings in Generics #68688

Closed

  • [wasm] blazor_scenarios for perf are not working completely #67323
    7.0.0
  • Regressions from simple forward substitution pass #64989
    7.0.0
  • Hello world sample fail native AOT #68711
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\nullabletypes\\castclassvaluetype_ro\\castclassvaluetype_ro.cmd #68451
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: add high precision maths functions like log1p #64184
  • [API Proposal/Question]: IFloatingPoint<TSelf> is totally base 2 IEEE 1985 oriented. We also need the basics for base10/decimal and other rational/fraction/real like numbers #62293
  • FileSystemEventArgs constructor throws with empty directory value #68566
    7.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Vector2.Equals doesn't use float.Equals in Equals implementation #58853
    7.0.0
  • crossgen: provide log (of not compiled methods) #6640
    Future
  • System.Text.Json: Using JsonStringEnumConverter, after changing CurrentCulture to "sv-SE", enums with unknown negative values serialize strangely, and cannot be deserialized. #68600
    7.0.0
  • API Proposal: File.ReadLinesAsync #2214
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add new Task() constructors to be consistent with Task.Run() #68637
  • Test failure System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollectorTests.TestHandleCollector #66571

PullRequests

Created

  • Add document describing how to disable tests #68727
  • JIT: fix loop recognition in OSR PGO methods #68725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers version #68724
    area-Meta
  • Clean up some debug-only code in Regex #68721
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add support for LLVM 14.x #68719
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Removal of IBC infrastructure #68717
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Bump Intellisense package to Preview 3 #68713
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Physical value numbering #68712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Detect the default locale name during startup on Apple platforms #68706
    area-System.Globalization
  • Reduce allocation in Process.GetProcessesByName #68705
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Pass UseStrongCrypto to server-side TLS #68704
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Fix static closed delegate fnptr crash. #68701
    area-Interop-mono
  • Test PR for #68366 #68700
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [WIP] wasm app host #68696
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Relax argument checks on pinned GCHandles #68694
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Delete some unused wrappers for registry operations #68689
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Ensure the generic math APIs are publicly exposed on nint/nuint where relevant #68693
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add Fixed and Sliding Window RateLimiters + PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #68695
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix declaration hiding in host #68684
    area-Host
  • Fix default install location used when running under x64 emulation on Windows arm64. #68671
    area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Allow empty directory values in FileSystemEventArgs/RenamedEventArgs ctors #68582
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Ensure the Equals instance method for the various vector types is correct #68691
    area-System.Numerics
  • Hoist the nullchecks for 'this' object #68588
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Firefox - remove item from commands_received #68618
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Ensure decimal.TryWriteSignificandLittleEndian correctly takes endianness into account #68599
    area-System.Runtime
  • BuildID parameter correction #68681
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix build and analyzer errors in amd64 table gen #68697
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix JsonStringEnumConverter bug concerning handling of negative values in changing cultures #68663
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • issue-2214 Create File.ReadLinesAsync() #66492
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1743544 #68680
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Migrate rest of the JS interop functions to out params #68642
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] More LLVM refactoring to support LLVM 14.x. #68426
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add initial impl of PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #67677
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Ensure TestHandleCollector has enough memory pressure to trigger #68652
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-bug, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Fix the TypeConverter when enabling UseSystemResourceKeys #68687
    area-System.ComponentModel, 7.0.0
  • Blazor Hybrid iOS & Mac Catalyst Performance Profiling #68685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add a document describing how to triage CI test failures #68682
  • Reenable 4244 #68615
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Adding generic-math support for CLong and CULong #68673
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Annotating System.Text.Json library for aot form factor #68464
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • refactor SslStream internals #68678
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Use all processor groups if the process is not affinitized to a single one #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • Add retry logic to FSW tests File/Directory_Move_Multiple_From_* #68066
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Type activator should be order agnostic #67493
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution
  • [MONO] Refactored code into marshal-ilgen and marshal-shared. #68656
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Use x64 directory if running x64 process on arm64 apphost #68583
    area-Host
  • Remove usage of *wprintf* family of functions #68237
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Adding the 2-parameter xplat shuffle helpers and accelerating them #68559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add X86Serialize hardware intrinsic. #68677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Fixing API compat issues between ref/src for attributes on properties #68432
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Move away from exposing internal EventPipe wait handle to EventPipeEventDispatcher. #68320
    area-Tracing-coreclr, area-Tracing-mono
  • Add support for storing method handle histograms in profiles #67919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Make concurrent reads on HttpHeaders thread-safe #68115
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Update solution files to include missing deps #68668
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add more array.sort test combination #68489
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix runtime-llvm pipeline #68495
    area-Infrastructure
  • WIP: Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][eventpipe] Write primitive types and UTF-16 strings in little endian order #68648
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Start morphing `TYP_STRUCT` local indirections in `LocalAddressVisitor` #68515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • WIP: CoreCLR support for default interface implementation of static virtual methods #66887
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Disable win-arm64 runtime tests on PRs for CoreCLR #68627
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Infrastructure] Update devcontainer #67656
    area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-29
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Call methods with byref parameters, e.g. this #1873

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Make dotnet list package --vulnerable take the target framework into account #24193
  • Workload not found: android-aot installing macos workload #24441

Updated

  • Mark the SDK in VS previews as preview in the installer UI #24534
    Backlog
  • Scheme for UrlAttribute #24991
  • Most dotnet commands fail with WorkloadManifestCompositionException after installing VSPreview #24854
  • Improve performance of workload installation #24843
  • .NET 6.0 upgrade gives System.TypeLoadException Could not load type 'System.IO.File' from assembly System.Runtime Version=6.0.0.0 #24835
  • Strange fallback RIDs #23390
  • Unused Private and Public methods are difficult to discover #24911
  • `SkipLocalsInit` property to make the SDK generate `[module: SkipLocalsInit]` #24894
  • Workloads: Better handling of package signature failures during install #24887
  • Error Installing dotnet-sdk on Ubuntu 18.04.6 LTS #24877
  • Default ImplicitUsings for Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web create ambiguity when referencing IHostingEnvironment #25121
  • Add command to print the RID of the .NET SDK. #25065
  • Possible build time regression on empty macOS (Arm64) projects #25037
  • Arm install wasm-tools ? Workload ID wasm-tools isn't supported on this platform #25031
  • CoreCLR failed to build with error NETSDK1182 with MSVC on windows amd64. #25005
  • dotnet publish -graph fails while dotnet build -graph works #24414
    Backlog
  • Cannot run Microsoft.Web.LibraryManager.Cli tool with .NET 6/7 SDK's #24648
  • Package validation Baseline Package Validator should optionally check semantic versioning rules #24781
  • Add MsDeploySkipRule support for web package deployment #12477
  • PackageValidation with --no-build when project has ProjectReference causes NETSDK1085 #24943
    7.0.1xx
  • [macOS] dotnet publish cannot write pkg file #24348

PullRequests

Created

  • Add back build retry #25141
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.NET.Compatibility.Common.targets #25132
    Area-Compatibility
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25130
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25129
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24914
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Force rebuilding R2R images if project files have been changed #25126
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25116
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Next helix test move #25057
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a test for native lib #25060
    Area-ILLink

Issues

Created

  • [semi-auto-props] Question: DefiniteAssignment warning for properties with a setter #6080
  • [semi-auto-props] Question: Override `set` only of an auto property #6077
  • [semi-auto-props] Question: Override `get` only of an auto property where the override uses `field` keyword #6076

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InvalidProgramException: Common Language Runtime detected an invalid program. #61055
  • Double clicking inline text hint for var inserts incorrectly #61052
  • editorconfig designer view fails to load when restored during solution load #61050
  • Adding .editorconfig immediately after cloning a repro fails to open/render editorconfig designer #61049
  • error IDE0055 - seems inconsistent running in Devops #61042
  • How to correctly extract all Statements and all Comment Trivia from `SyntaxBlock`s #61041
  • C# Interactive window doesn't show error squiggles when Pull Diagnostics is turned on #61033

Closed

  • IDE does not offer name simplification for global using type aliases #59042
    17.2
  • provide fix all ability to CodeRefactoringProvider #32461
    Backlog
  • No warning for obsolete constructor when using generic `new()` constraint #61009
    Compiler.Next

PullRequests

Created

  • Share SyntaxContext among all internal CompletionProviders #61057
    Area-IDE
  • Remove extra new line character from end of file #61056
    Area-IDE, Community
  • RazorLineFormattingOptions #61054
    Area-IDE
  • Fix double-click on inline-hints for 'var' #61053
    Area-IDE
  • Update config for VS branch snap #61051
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support adding multiple parameters on new lines past the original last parameter #61048
    Area-IDE
  • Backport build yml and publishing script changes #61043
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix compiler warning reported for target-typed new under collection initializer #61040
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Prevent EnC error when changing partial methods with lambdas #61039
    Area-Interactive
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add PROTOTYPE comments for test cases #61038
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix nullability of source link service #61037
    Area-IDE
  • Treat some nint/nuint conversions as standard conversions #61034
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC #61032
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Use IAsyncDisposable instead of AsyncLazy<T> for lazy cancellation of final OOP request #61020
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [LSP] Null check semantic tokens workspace capability #61047
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #60934
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update simplify-type-names to understand global imports. #60872
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main into features/ref-fields #61046
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #61036
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings (approach #2) #60906
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Merge 'main' into 'DefaultInterfaceImplementation' #61026
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #61035
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61030
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Temporarily disable editorconfig tests on linux (#61018) #61031
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #61029
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add three new options for collapsing/outlining on file open #60743
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61060
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61059
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61058
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Cherry-Pick 60973 To 17.2 #60999
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Verify arguments length for diagnostic messages #60925
    Area-Compilers
  • Record read of ref local even if value is discarded #60910
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix focus on rename UI opening #60846
    Area-IDE
  • Changed IDE0059 codefix title in pattern matching #60822
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Code generator fallback options #60882
    Area-IDE
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Add new background analysis scope option for compiler diagnostics #60808
    Area-Analyzers
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add feature to show users what global-usings are in scope at the top of a file. #60893
    Area-IDE, Feature Request
  • Enable declaration, implementation(in non-interfaces) and consumption of virtual static members. #60965
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Make NamingPreferences message-pack serializable #61006
    Area-IDE
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
  • Fix XmlTextAttribute space normalization #61012
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor css-isolation and js-isolation via rendertreebuilder #41450
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_netty #41445
  • Add method to Results/TypedResults to allow creating a ContentHttpResult with a custom status code #41444
  • Cannot debug Blazor Wasm application on .Net 6: Unable to attach to browser #41443
  • How to properly write an implementation of the IClaimsTransformation interface in ASP.NET core 6 ? #41440
  • Blazor Hybrid is not as fast running Parallel code in Release mode #41439
  • Blazor WASM: Misleading error message when calling DotNetObjectReference.invokeMethod and then calling JSRuntime.InvokeAsync<T> #41438
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plaintext_netty, plaintext_nodejs, plainTextEmptyFilter #41437
  • Profile and fix low hanging fruit in startup usage of minimal APIs #41436
  • Reduce usage of Expression.Constant in RequestDelegateFactory #41435

Closed

  • Kestrel should throw BadHttpRequestException instead of InvalidOperationExceptions for absolute-form targets with non-ASCII characters #41071
    7.0-preview5
  • select component renders on first change with null value when inside CascadingValue=this and plain wrapper #41424
  • Blazor webassembly App: Cannot call unknown function mono_wasm_set_is_debugger_attached, make sure it is exported #41324
  • Blazor AOT compilation fails at ComputeBlazorPublishAssets.GroupExistingStaticWebAssets #37610
    6.0.x
  • Blazor Server .NET 6 Drag n Drop mobile devices #41394

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK and use 'u8' string literals #41449

Merged

  • Add query for how to look at helix work item perf to helix docs #41448
    7.0-preview5
  • Throw BadHttpRequestException for non-ASCII in absolute-form targets #41334
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Unquarantine behaving startup tests #41446
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Revert "Try out 1es images" #41441
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Fixed formatting #41434
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers to latest stable #41115
    area-infrastructure
  • Helix Restore Issue Mitigation #41311
    area-infrastructure
  • Unify initialization in DefaultHttpContextFactory #41333
    area-runtime
  • Enable trimming for middleware and friends #41373
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Draft Surrogate argument list #41325
    area-web-frameworks
  • Sync shared code from runtime #41317
    blocked, area-runtime
  • Update duende versions to 6.0.4 #41370
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for RouteHandlerInvocationContext<> overloads #41406
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Fix diff checks for ContentRoot and WebRoot #41182
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Remove SocketException usage #38094
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Diagnosing threadpool starvation #2907
    .NET 7.0

Updated

  • Add docs to better describe the .NET diagnostic experience #515

  • Question: Long term plans for Microsoft.Diagnostics.NETCore.Client and profiler API? #2996
    Future

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Hybrid iOS Disable Elastic Scrolling #6689
  • iOS Checkbox is causing an infinite loop #6687
    6.0.300
  • Drag and drop leads to crash #6684
  • SwitchCell is not compliant with best accessibility practices #6683
  • Shell Page layout Different Between Android and Windows #6680
  • [Enhancement] Provide Shell.TitleBarIsVisible #6679
  • ImageButton visual state does not reset #6676
  • Platform dependent file not found #6674
  • [Windows] <CollectionView.Footer> in connection with <SearchBar> #6672
  • [Android] <CollectionView.EmptyView> in connection with <SearchBar> #6671
  • PathFigureCollectionConverter.ParseStringToPathFigureCollection not working correctly #6670
  • MAUI Essentials sample redundantly copies file in MediaPicker sample #6667
  • Exception if swipe to dismiss modal page on iOS (Simulator, real device not tested yet) #6666
  • Give a possibility to disable overscroll in AppShell/ShellContent #6662
  • [Windows] Can't debug with OnAppearing() and Shell.Current.GoToAsync() #6661
  • MAUI Essentials MediaPicker CapturePhotoAsync on Windows distinguish between no camera and cancelled #6660
  • [Android] Horizontal Scrollable blank page #6659
  • ContentView does not respect IsClippedToBounds (does not clip children) #6656
  • [Question] async void in MAUI Essentials samples #6655
  • Can't Logout while using OnAppearing() [RC2] #6653
  • Navigation bar vanishes when recreating Shell on Windows #6652
  • [Android] ListView does not calculate RowHeight (uses fixed value?) #6651
  • SwipeView inaccessible for screenreader users on Android #6648
  • ListView ContextActions cause app to crash on Android #6647
  • How to change CornerRadius dynamically? #6646
  • Random System.NullReferenceException .Net Maui app under macOS #6645
  • GestureRecognizers inhibit CollectionView Selection on Android #6644
  • Maui build system ignores VS BuildAction=None and builds anyway #6642
  • MAUI clearing storage of app #6641
  • MAUI Blazor is loading forever on Android 6 #6640

Closed

  • Blazor WebView iOS Scrolling Behaves Strangely #6347
    6.0.300
  • [iOS] [Android] Grid measuring auto size row incorrectly when using RowSpan #4947
    6.0.300
  • [Android] NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces() returns strange values on Android 11 + IPv6 #6649
  • Grid only renders and lays out first child #4671
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • FlexLayout > Frame > FlexLayout > Any Content throws error. #3826
    6.0.300
  • FlexLayout doesn't size correctly. #3852
    6.0.300
  • FlexLayout doesn't measure out to full height when placed inside ScrollView #3848
    6.0.300
  • VisualStateGroup System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException: Exception has been thrown by the target of an invocation. #5946
    6.0.300
  • Setting Label.FontSize at runtime does not do anything #6650
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • bad grid layout #5571
    6.0.300
  • OnIdiom don't work correct on Shell - FlyoutBehavior #5524
    6.0.300
  • [Windows] Wrong CollectionView item size using MeasureFirstItem #4113
    6.0.300
  • CollectionView using Static property as ItemsSource is not working #4043
    6.0.300
  • Entry cursor position return to start #6675
  • Flyout margins and settings do not display correctly #4762
    6.0.300
  • Android application in Release requires permission whereas Debug does not #6576
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Verify Blazor Hybrid scenarios on Windows in multi window apps #5722
    6.0.300
  • [iOS]HorizontalLayoutOptions=Center but the editor still is displayed on start #5116
    6.0.300
  • [Windows] No Tabs #6654
  • GetSSLHostnameVerifier available for AndroidMessageHandler #6664
  • Blazor Desktop: Support for auth #2529

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Changes in parent owned collection cause unexpected behavior in nested owned collection #27918
  • Examine additional errors in SQL exceptions to properly handle connections #27917
  • HasDefaultValueSql is overriding my actual supplied value it seems #27915
  • Nullability check in in-memory provider does not recognize default value #27913

Closed

  • Migration for updated seed data does not set all enum values converted to string correctly #27575
    7.0.0
  • Don't depend on change tracking for data seeding #22063
    7.0.0
  • Don't use Min/Max batch size values when generating migrations #12466
    7.0.0
  • How to explicitly run model validation as part of a unit test in EF Core 6 #27914
  • Multiple one-to-one relations in one entity generate differently in migration #27904

PullRequests

Created

  • Force NullabilityInfoContextSupport=true in user projects #27916

Merged

  • Add TPC support for data seeding #27903

Updated

  • Refactor UpdateSqlGenerator to separate select logic #27902

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installing the 6.0.2 ref pack MSI removes the 6.0.0 ref pack MSI #13237

PullRequests

Created

  • Add the cross-targeting app host packs to the arm64 installer #13735
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #13734
  • Handle NuGet package source mapping in source-build tasks. #13733
  • Handle NuGet package source mapping in source-build tasks. #13732
  • Add offline smoke-test option #13731

Merged

  • Update smoke-test prereq artifact to include architecture #13725
  • Onboard templating repo into source-build tarball #13724
  • Remove sha from source tarball repo dir names #13726
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #13721
